Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Nothing I would definitely go there again
Positive_Review: The reception guy is the best there is He s helpful caring and always remembers your name The hotel has a 24hrs complementary coffee and small snacks table and the minibar was free gets refilled every 2 days Location is less than 5 minutes walking from the champs elysee which is perfect

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Would have liked a mirror in the bedroom and not just in the toilet but otherwise perfect
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel in a central location with lovely little touches which make it special such as macaroons on arrival and a free afternoon tea and mini bar Friendly helpful staff and clean comfortable room perfect to relax in after a busy day sightseeing

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: We only stayed for a one night If we planned to stay more we would ve definitely changed the hotel We had been upgraded to a bigger room which was so small I can t imagine what the other room would have been like The room had poor lighting too dark to put a makeup on
Positive_Review: The staff was so friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: The room decor was lovely the beds were super comfy the macaroons upon arrival complementary afternoon tea the staff were so helpful and the location could not have been better

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Way too small elevator and bathroom But acceptable since it is a hotel in paris
Positive_Review: Small hotel but good quality Tea time and small sweets prepared at the reception were so nice and adorable Breakfast buffet as well was very small but in a good quality Super nice and kind staffs

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: The room was quite small Sufficient for our stay but would prefer a bigger space No restaurant or bar however you have the option to help yourself to an alcoholic drink out of hours and write to your room The breakfast was mostly the same each day
Positive_Review: Very good location Only about 10 min walk to the closest metro and arc de triumph Staff were very friendly Absolute pleasure to deal with

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Lots of descriptions including in this case the name of the hotel imply proximity to places which in reality tend to be a lot further away than one would assume So in this case the Champs d Elysee was actually a few streets away while not necessarily a big deal is useful to know before hand if you are not in fighting form Google maps is your friend
Positive_Review: Chain run establishment old Parisian building done up nicely and in a modern style on the inside Very sweet staff 24hr coffee they do serve breakfast but we chose to buy fresh croissants and coffee at the local bakery which were great so cannot comment on the breakfast but people were certainly eating there Location is sort of mixed at a macro level its in a good area at a specific level it is a brisk walk from the metro but there are local buses that stop outside and taxis are plentiful as is Uber and to get to the Opera area etc its a bit of a hike on foot Rooms beds showers all great We got there at noon but couldn t get the room till official check in time so had to mark time but that s not unusual The view from our room looked like the first Bourne movie when Matt Damon goes to Paris wide streets with massive trees and classical buildings cars and bikes parked on both sides We would stay there again

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: We stayed on top floor where bathroom had slanted ceiling which would not suit a tall person though it was perfect for us if tall I d suggest a lower floor
Positive_Review: Lovely boutique hotel in quiet location so close to Arc de Triomphe and the Champs Elysee plus within walking distance of so many infamous Parisian landmarks Bedroom was very spacious large comfy bed well sound proofed complimentary non alcohol mini bar kettle and safe at no extra charge bathroom very clean with bath shower etc All staff were exceptionally pleasant welcoming helpful and friendly such a lovely hotel to stay in

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Our room was very well appointed but found that it was too warm and couldn t control the thermostat
Positive_Review: We have stayed at this hotel previously and chose to return for a one night stay because of it s great location just off the Champs Elysee and because of the warm welcome and comfort that it offers

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Bed was not comfortable very hard but it s a personal choice matter
Positive_Review: Excellent client oriented service in the hotel Pretty exceptional for Paris

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: Convenient for all the tourist sites Staff very friendly Unexpected room upgrade lovely surprise Free afternoon tea and cakes plus free tea coffee sweets any time

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: I love everything Shorty Very center clean lovely staff 5tea fast internet Especially i would like to say Thank you to Ousman Don t think twice to book

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: The room got very hot which meant we had to leave the window open at times
Positive_Review: The hotel was great The staff were so friendly and helpful All of the personal touches like the free mini bar in the room made our stay even better The wifi was fantastic and the breakfast had every option you could want The location was excellent so close to all of the sites Overall a very pleasant stay

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Room very warm and one was unable to override the preset temperature to reduce Rather hot than cold though Room cleaning nearby was noisy hoovering etc promptly from 9am which woke me earlier than may have otherwise Reception kindly agreed a later check out without quibble and a free mini bar was a nice touch too Overall a very pleasant stay in a friendly hotel
Positive_Review: Staff great afternoon Tea was sweet Very accommodating and responsive

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: The towels are very few and no shower cap
Positive_Review: My stay was great The staff were very helpful and pleasant The location is just 10 minutes walking from champs elysees

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: The staff is very friendly the guy in the reception is very helpful They have a welcome coffe set and chocolates in the reception for every one for free They help you by getting your luggage so you can enjoy your day till the check in The mini bar contents are free and refilled every 3 days It has very nice location in the champs elysee very near of the arc de triumph and other attractions The rooms are very clean and comfortable If i come back to paris for sure i will stay here again

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: Excellent value for money when thinking location only 500m from Champs Elysees Helpful staff who spoke good English Free wi fi but you can get portable you can carry it everywhere and connetct to your phone or tablet wi fi system only for 2 day and it worked very well highly recommended Close to RER trainstation so easy te get from Airport Close to metro Clean rooms

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: The hotel is very good as it is in a great location literally 2 min from Champs Elysees The staff was very friendly and helpful They offer a mobile wifi to use outside of the hotel for 2 euros a day and it can have multiple phones in use I have never seen that before and I always spend lots of money buying internet The hotel was clean and the value was great I recommend this hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: For a 4 star hotel there could have been a few more products in the bathroom there was no conditioner or toothpaste but this is a small thing
Positive_Review: Everything was very clean the bed was very comfortable and the location is great All the taxis we took knew the area that the hotel was located in so getting around was very easy Breakfast was nice with fresh croissants and pastries juices hot drinks eggs cheeses fruit cereal etc Friendly staff and a few decent products in the bathroom Our twin room was not very big but it was fine for a 3 night stay Free mini bar in room and free coffee sweets in the lobby

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect Staff very proffessional helpfull and really nice internet good and fast Minibar with softdrinks for free Nice breakfast perfect localization just ideal for Paris weekend break away I do not understand why some people making complain about room size ITS PARIS and beside its written on the webpage Roomwasnt big but it was not to small either

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Positive_Review: there s a welcome food which is macaroons Which made us feel really welcomed since its the known food from paris And the internet which we can use even outside the hotel so that we have connection throughout our stay in paris by the way it was fast internet and its cheap aswell

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: The bad room is smal I understand that is an old hotel and in Par s in comun that size
Positive_Review: Thank a lot Excelent the atention and the services of the staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: Reception woman did not know how to smile or seem welcoming Really small room for a family of three adults
Positive_Review: Its location Complimentary drinks in the mini bar

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: All metro stations were pretty far away from the hotel but luckily there was a bus station nearby
Positive_Review: Staff facility minibar everything was good and quiet Jamal was very friendly and helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
Negative_Review: It was a bit noisy at night but it got quieter
Positive_Review: I liked the location and the little coffee area The staff we very friendly and helpful Wonderful little place wish I could have stayed longer

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture

Hotel_Name: Hotel Champs Elys es Friedland by Happyculture
